languages.text: The {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Bladedancer{/g}'s {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} is now determined by {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} (if their Weapon {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Skill{/g} is higher). The Bladedancer deals +<u>(5 + Medicae / 10)</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} and can use medikits as if having Medicae skill advancement or the corresponding feature or {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g}.

traits.locale_text: The Bladedancer's {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} is now determined by {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Weapon Skill{/g} instead of {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} (if their Weapon Skill is higher). The Bladedancer deals +<u>5+(Medicae / 10)</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}critical damage{/g} and can use medikits as if having Medicae skill advancement or the corresponding feature or talent.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Медицина{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}танцора смерти{/g} теперь определяется показателем {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Ближнего Боя{/g}, а не {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Интеллекта{/g} (если значение Ближнего Боя выше).{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}{/g} Танцор смерти наносит +<u>(5 + Медицина / 10)</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}критического урона{/g} и может использовать медкомплекты, как при получении соответствующей способности или {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}таланта{/g}.

languages.text: La {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} du {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}danselame{/g} dépend désormais de sa {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Compétence d'arme{/g} au lieu de son {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligence{/g} (à condition que sa {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Compétence{/g} d'arme soit plus élevée). Le danselame inflige +<u>(5 + Medicae / 10)</u> % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}dégâts critiques{/g} et peut utiliser des médikits comme s'il disposait de l'amélioration de la compétence Medicae ou de la caractéristique ou du {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talent{/g} correspondant.

languages.text: Die {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g}-Fähigkeit des {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}Klingentänzers{/g} wird jetzt durch die {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Waffenfähigkeit{/g} bestimmt, nicht mehr durch seine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Intelligenz{/g} (wenn die Waffen{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}fähigkeit{/g} höher ist). Der Klingentänzer verursacht +<u>(5 + Medicae / 10)</u>% {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}kritischen Schaden{/g} und kann Medikits einsetzen, als hätte er den Medicae-Fertigkeitsfortschritt, die entsprechende Eigenschaft oder das {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}Talent{/g}.

languages.text: La {g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}Medicae{/g} del {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}hoja danzante{/g} ahora se determina por su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}Habilidad de armas{/g} en lugar de su {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}Inteligencia{/g} (si su {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}Habilidad{/g} de armas es superior). El hoja danzante inflige +<u>(5 + Medicae / 10)</u> % de {g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}daño crítico{/g} y puede usar botiquines como si tuviera un avance de habilidad de Medicae o la característica o {g|Encyclopedia:Talent}talento{/g} correspondiente.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}刀锋舞者{/g}的{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}医疗{/g}技能将取决于{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}武器技能{/g}，而非{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}智力{/g}（如果武器技能更高的话{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}{/g}）。刀锋舞者造成的{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}暴击伤害{/g}提高<u>（5+医疗/10）</u>%，且可以使用医疗包，视为拥有医疗技能进阶，或拥有相应的特性或{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}天赋{/g}。

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerBladedancerGlossary}ブレードダンサー{/g}の{g|Encyclopedia:SkillMedicae}メディケア{/g}は、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerIntelligence}知性{/g}ではなく{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWeaponSkill}近接攻撃{/g}よって決定されるようになった（武器{g|Encyclopedia:Skills}スキル{/g}が高い場合）。ブレードダンサーは、+<u>（5 + メディケア / 10）</u>%の{g|Encyclopedia:CritChancesAndCritDamageGlossary}クリティカルダメージ{/g}を与え、メディケアのスキルや対応する特徴や{g|Encyclopedia:Talent}才能{/g}を持っているかのようにメディキットを使用することができる。
